00026 BT_GBFHTML::BT_GBFHTML(){
00027   setTokenStart("<");
00028     setTokenEnd(">");
00029     
00030     setTokenCaseSensitive(true);
00031 
00032 //  addTokenSubstitute("Rf", ")</small></font>");// end of footnote
00033     addTokenSubstitute("Rf", ")</span>");// end of footnote
00034 
00035     addTokenSubstitute("FI", "<i>"); // italics begin
00036     addTokenSubstitute("Fi", "</i>");
00037     addTokenSubstitute("FB", "<b>"); // bold begin
00038     addTokenSubstitute("Fb", "</b>");
00039     
00040 //  addTokenSubstitute("FR", QString::fromLatin1("<font color=\"%1\">").arg(jesuswords_color).latin1());        
00041     addTokenSubstitute("FR", QString::fromLatin1("<span id=\"jesuswords\">").latin1());
00042 
00043     addTokenSubstitute("Fr", "</font>");
00044     addTokenSubstitute("FU", "<u>"); // underline begin
00045     addTokenSubstitute("Fu", "</u>");
00046 
00047 //  addTokenSubstitute("FO", "<cite>"); //  Old Testament quote begin
00048 //  addTokenSubstitute("Fo", "</cite>");
00049     addTokenSubstitute("FO", "<span id=\"quotation\">"); //  Old Testament quote begin
00050     addTokenSubstitute("Fo", "</span>");
00051     
00052 
00053  addTokenSubstitute("FS", "<sup>"); // Superscript begin// Subscript begin
00054     addTokenSubstitute("Fs", "</sup>");
00055     addTokenSubstitute("FV", "<sub>"); // Subscript begin
00056     addTokenSubstitute("Fv", "</sub>");
00057 
00058 //  addTokenSubstitute("TT", QString::fromLatin1(" <h1><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());
00059 //  addTokenSubstitute("Tt", "</font></h1>");
00060     addTokenSubstitute("TT", QString::fromLatin1("<div id=\"booktitle\">").local8Bit());
00061     addTokenSubstitute("Tt", "</div>");
00062     
00063 //  addTokenSubstitute("Ts", "</font></h2>");
00064 //  addTokenSubstitute("TS", QString::fromLatin1(" <H2><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());  
00065     addTokenSubstitute("Ts", "</div>");
00066     addTokenSubstitute("TS", QString::fromLatin1("<div id=\"sectiontitle\">").local8Bit()); 
00067             
00068 //  addTokenSubstitute("PP", "<cite>"); //  poetry  begin
00069 //  addTokenSubstitute("Pp", "</cite>");
00070     addTokenSubstitute("PP", "<span id=\"poetry\">"); //  poetry  begin
00071     addTokenSubstitute("Pp", "</span>");
00072 
00073     addTokenSubstitute("Fn", "</font>"); //  font  end
00074     addTokenSubstitute("CL", "<br>"); //  new line
00075     addTokenSubstitute("CM", "<!p><br>"); //  paragraph <!P> is a non showing comment that can be changed in the front end to <P> if desired
00076     addTokenSubstitute("CG", ">"); // literal greater-than sign
00077     addTokenSubstitute("CT", "<"); // literal less-than sign
00078     addTokenSubstitute("JR", "<span align=\"right\">"); // right align begin
00079     addTokenSubstitute("JC", "<span align=\"center\">"); // center align begin
00080     addTokenSubstitute("JL", "</span>"); // align end
00081 }

00084 char BT_GBFHTML::ProcessText(char * text, int maxlen, const SWKey * key, const SWModule * module){
00085     BT_BASICFILTER::ProcessText(text, maxlen, key, module);
00086     BT_BASICFILTER::ProcessRWPRefs(text, maxlen);
00087 }

00089 
00090 bool BT_GBFHTML::handleToken(char **buf, const char *token, DualStringMap &userData) {
00091     if (!substituteToken(buf, token)) {  //more than a simple replace
00092     const int tokenLength = strlen(token);
00093         unsigned long i;
00094         unsigned long len = strlen(token);
00095 
00096         if (!strncmp(token, "WG", 2)){ // strong's numbers greek
00097             char num[6];
00098             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)
00099                     num[i-2] = token[i];
00100             num[i-2]=0;
00101 
00102             pushString(buf," <span id=\"strongnumber\"><a href=\"strongs://Greek/%s\">&lt;%s&gt;</a></span> ",
00103                 num, num);
00104         }
00105 
00106         if (!strncmp(token, "WH", 2)){ // strong's numbers hebrew
00107             char num[6];
00108             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)
00109                     num[i-2] = token[i];
00110             num[i-2]=0;
00111 
00112             pushString(buf," <span id=\"strongnumber\"><a href=\"strongs://Hebrew/%s\">&lt;%s&gt;</a></span> ",
00113                 num, num);
00114         }
00115 
00116         else if (!strncmp(token, "WTG", 3)) { // strong's numbers tense greek
00117             char num[16];
00118             for (i = 3; i < tokenLength; i++)
00119                     num[i-3] = token[i];
00120             num[i-3]=0;
00121 
00122             pushString(buf," <span id=\"morphcode\"><a href=\"morph://Greek/%s\">(%s)</a></span> ",
00123                 num, num);
00124         }
00125 
00126         else if (!strncmp(token, "WTH", 3)) { // strong's numbers tense hebrew
00127 
00128             char num[6];
00129             for (i = 3; i < tokenLength; i++)
00130                     num[i-3] = token[i];
00131             num[i-3]=0;
00132 
00133             pushString(buf," <span id=\"morphcode\"><a href=\"morph://Hebrew/%s\">(%s)</a></span> ",
00134                 num, num);
00135         }
00136 
00137         else if (!strncmp(token, "RB", 2)) {
00138             pushString(buf, "<span id=\"footnotepre\">");
00139             userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] = "true";
00140         }
00141 
00142         else if (!strncmp(token, "RF", 2)) {
00143             if(userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] == "true") {
00144                 userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] = "false";
00145                 pushString(buf, "</span> ");
00146             }
00147             pushString(buf,"<span id=\"footnote\"> (",footnote_color);
00148         }
00149 
00150         else if (!strncmp(token, "FN", 2)) {
00151             pushString(buf, "<font face=\"");
00152             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)               
00153                 if(token[i] != '\"')
00154                     *(*buf)++ = token[i];
00155             pushString(buf,"\">");
00156         }
00157         else if (!strncmp(token, "CA", 2)) {    // ASCII value
00158             *(*buf)++ = (char)atoi(&token[2]);
00159         }       
00160         else {
00161             return false;
00162         }
00163     }
00164     return true;
00165 }
